briefTitle: Ezetimibe and Atorvastatin vs. Atorvastatin in Patients Age 65 and Older at High Risk for Coronary Heart Disease (CHD)(0653-112)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel Arm, 12-Week Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Ezetimibe 10 mg When Added to Atorvastatin 10 mg Versus Titration to Atorvastatin 20 mg and to 40 mg in Elderly Patients With Hypercholesterolemia at High Risk for CHD
summary: A 12 week clinical trial in patients 65 years of age and older with hypercholesterolemia at high risk for coronary heart disease to study the effects of atorvastatin and ezetimibe given in combination and two higher doses of atorvastatin on lipid lowering.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in LDL-C at Week 6
